TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract View

Docs.summary: Contains the view attributes (show all, field shading, table gridlines, and so on) for a window or pane.

remarks.para: Use the View property of a or object to return the View object.
Use the property to change the view.
Use the property to change the size of the text on-screen.
Use the property to view comments, endnotes, footnotes, or the document header or footer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

Docs.summary: Returns a object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BrowseToWindow { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.BrowseToWindow : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CollapseAllHeadings() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Collapses all the headings in the document.

remarks.para: This method corresponds to the Collapse All Headings command on the Expand/Collapse submenu of the context menu that appears when you right-click a heading.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CollapseOutline([in]object& Range) runtime managed
Public Sub CollapseOutline (Optional ByRef Range As Object)

Docs.param: Optional object. The range of paragraphs to be collapsed. If this argument is omitted, the entire selection is collapsed.
Docs.summary: Collapses the text under the selection or the specified range by one heading level.

remarks.para: Note If the document isn't in outline or master document view, an error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdColumnWidth ColumnWidth { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdColumnWidth get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdColumnWidth value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or gets a constant that determines the column width in reading mode. Read-write

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ConflictMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ConflictMode : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether the document is in conflict mode view.
Docs.value: true if the document is in conflict mode view; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.para: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisplayBackgrounds { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DisplayBackgrounds : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets a Boolean that represents whether background colors and images are shown when a document is displayed in print layout view.

remarks.para: The DisplayBackgrounds property corresponds to the Background colors and images (Print view only) option located on the View tab of the Options dialog box.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisplayPageBoundaries { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DisplayPageBoundaries : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True to display the top and bottom margins (white space) and the gray area (gray space) between pages in a document. False to hide from view the white and gray space so that the pages flow together as one long page. The default value is True.

remarks.para: This feature is only available in the Print Layout view and only affects the gray space on the top and bottom of a page, not the left and right sides of a page. This setting affects the document in the in the specified window. When the document is saved, the state of this setting is saved with it.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisplaySmartTags { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DisplaySmartTags : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True for Microsoft Word to display an underline beneath smart tags in a document.

remarks.para: Smart tags are marked in documents with a dashed underline. Setting the DisplaySmartTags property to False does not remove smart tags; it only turns off displaying the underline.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Draft { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Draft : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if all the text in a window is displayed in the same sans-serif font with minimal formatting to speed up display.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int EnlargeFontsLessThan { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.EnlargeFontsLessThan : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExpandAllHeadings() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Expands all the headings in the document.

remarks.para: This method corresponds to the Expand All Headings command on the Expand/Collapse submenu of the context menu that appears when you right-click a heading.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExpandOutline([in]object& Range) runtime managed
Public Sub ExpandOutline (Optional ByRef Range As Object)

Docs.param: Optional object. The range of paragraphs to be expanded. If this argument is omitted, the entire selection is expanded.
Docs.summary: Expands the text under the selection or the specified range by one heading level.

remarks.para: Note If the document isn't in outline or master document view, an error occurs.

Docs.summary: Returns or sets on-screen shading for form fields.

remarks.para: can be one of these WdFieldShading constants:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool FullScreen { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.FullScreen : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if the window is in full-screen view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Magnifier { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Magnifier : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if the pointer is displayed as a magnifying glass in print preview, indicating that the user can click to zoom in on a particular area of the page or zoom out to see an entire page or spread of pages.

remarks.para: This property generates an error if the view is not print preview.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MailMergeDataView { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.MailMergeDataView : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if mail merge data is displayed instead of mail merge fields in the specified window.

remarks.para: If the specified window isn't a main document, an error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode MarkupMode { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets a constant that represents the display mode for tracked changes. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NextHeaderFooter() runtime managed

Docs.summary: If the selection is in a header, this method moves to the next header within the current section (for example, from an odd header to an even header) or to the first header in the following section. If the selection is in a footer, this method moves to the next footer.

remarks.para: Note If the selection is in the last header or footer in the last section of the document, or if it's not in a header or footer at all, an error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPageColor PageColor { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPageColor get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPageColor value); };
member this.PageColor : Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPageColor with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns and sets the page color in Reading mode. Read-write .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Panning { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Panning : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets a Boolean that represents whether Microsoft Office Word is in Panning mode. Read/write.

remarks.para: Panning mode changes the mouse pointer to a hand and enables the user to press and drag the document to scroll through the pages.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns an object that represents the parent object of the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PreviousHeaderFooter() runtime managed

Docs.summary: If the selection is in a header, this method moves to the previous header within the current section (for example, from an even header to an odd header) or to the last header in the previous section. If the selection is in a footer, this method moves to the previous footer.

remarks.para: Note If the selection is in the first header or footer in the first section of the document, or if it's not in a header or footer at all, an error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReadingLayout { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ReadingLayout : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Sets or returns a Boolean that represents whether a document is being viewed in reading layout view.

remarks.para: True switches the document to reading layout view. False closes reading layout view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReadingLayoutActualView { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ReadingLayoutActualView : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Sets or returns a Boolean that represents whether pages displayed in reading layout view are displayed using the same layout as printed pages.

remarks.para: In reading layout view, pages are not displayed with the full content contained in the literal printed pages, as you would see in normal view or in print layout view. Instead they are displayed in screens. When the ReadingLayoutActualView property is set to True, the document is displayed as it would appear when printed. On smaller monitors, this requires a zoom level that makes the document hard to read, but it is fine for larger monitors.

member this.ReadingLayoutAllowEditing : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

Docs.summary: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

Docs.summary: Returns or sets a constant that represents whether margins are visible or hidden when a document is viewed in Full Screen Reading view. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RevisionsBalloonShowConnectingLines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RevisionsBalloonShowConnectingLines : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True for Microsoft Word to display connecting lines from the text to the revision and comment balloons.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonMargin RevisionsBalloonSide { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonMargin get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonMargin value); };

Docs.summary: Sets or returns a constant that specifies whether Microsoft Word displays revision balloons in the left or right margin in a document.

remarks.para: can be one of these WdRevisionsBalloonMargin constants:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float RevisionsBalloonWidth { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.RevisionsBalloonWidth : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Sets or returns a Single representing the global setting in Microsoft Word that specifies the width of the revision balloons.

remarks.para: The width of revision balloons includes padding of one-half inch between the document margin and the edge of the balloon and one-eighth of an inch between the edge of the balloon and the edge of the paper. Microsoft Word adds space along the left or right edge of the paper. This width is extended into the margin and does not change the width of the document or paper size. Use the property to specify the measurement to use when setting the RevisionsBalloonWidth property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonWidthType RevisionsBalloonWidthType { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonWidthType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsBalloonWidthType value); };

Docs.summary: Sets or returns a constant representing the global setting that specifies how Microsoft Word measures the width of revision balloons.

remarks.para: can be one of these WdRevisionsBalloonWidthType constants:
wdBalloonWidthPercent Measured as a percentage of the width of the document.
wdBalloonWidthPoints Measured in points.
The RevisionsBalloonWidthType property sets the measurement unit to use when setting the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RevisionsFilter As RevisionsFilter

Docs.summary: Returns an instance of a RevisionsFilter object. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode RevisionsMode { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsMode value); };

Docs.summary: Sets or returns a constant representing the global option that specifies whether Microsoft Word displays balloons in the margin or inline with the document's text.

remarks.para: can be one of these WdRevisionsMode constants:
wdBalloonRevisions Displays revisions in balloons in the left or right margin.
wdInLineRevisions Displays revisions within the text using strikethrough for deletions and underlining for insertions. This is the default setting for prior versions of Word.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsView RevisionsView { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsView get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdRevisionsView value); };

Docs.summary: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSeekView SeekView { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSeekView get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSeekView value); };
member this.SeekView : Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSeekView with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the document element displayed in print layout view.

remarks.para: can be one of these WdSeekView constants:
This property generates an error if the view is not print layout view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ShadeEditableRanges { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ShadeEditableRanges : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets an Integer that represents whether shading is applied to the ranges in a document for which users have permission to modify. True shades the ranges in a document that users can modify.

remarks.para: Range shading is on by default. When range shading is on, or when you set the property to True, the ShadeEditableRanges property returns a value of 65535. When you set the ShadeEditableRanges property to False it returns a value of 0. The values have no meaning beyond indicating whether the property is True or False.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowAll { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowAll : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if all nonprinting characters (such as hidden text, tab marks, space marks, and paragraph marks) are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ShowAllHeadings() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Toggles between showing all text (headings and body text) and showing only headings.

remarks.para: Note This method generates an error if the view isn't outline view or master document view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowAnimation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowAnimation : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowBookmarks { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowBookmarks : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if square brackets are displayed at the beginning and end of each bookmark.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowComments { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowComments : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True for Microsoft Word to display the comments in a document.

remarks.para: If revision marks are displayed in balloons in the right or left margin, comments are displayed in balloons. If revision marks are displayed inline, the text to which comments apply is surrounded by wide-angled square brackets; when a user places the mouse pointer over the text within the brackets, the related comment is displayed in a square balloon directly above the mouse pointer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowCropMarks { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowCropMarks : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets a Boolean that represents whether to show crop marks in the corners of pages to indicate where margins are located. Read/write.

remarks.para: Displaying crop marks does not allow a user to change the margins by dragging the crop marks. Crop marks are only displayed to indicate where margins are located in the page. This property corresponds to the Crop marks check box in the Advanced tab of the Word Options dialog box.
Note: Crop marks are shown by default in East Asian languages and are off by default in all other langauges.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowDrawings { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowDrawings : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if objects created with the drawing tools are displayed in print layout view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowFieldCodes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowFieldCodes : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if field codes are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowFirstLineOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowFirstLineOnly : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if only the first line of body text is shown in outline view.

remarks.para: This property generates an error if the view isn't outline or master document view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowFormat { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowFormat : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if character formatting is visible in outline view.

remarks.para: This property generates an error if the view isn't outline or master document view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowFormatChanges { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowFormatChanges : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if character formatting is visible in outline view.

remarks.para: This property generates an error if the view isn't outline or master document view.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ShowHeading([in]int32 Level) runtime managed

Docs.param: Required Integer. The outline heading level (a number from 1 to 9).
Docs.summary: Shows all headings up to the specified heading level and hides subordinate headings and body text.

remarks.para: Note This method generates an error if the view isn't outline view or master document view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowHiddenText { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowHiddenText : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if text formatted as hidden text is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowHighlight { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowHighlight : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if highlight formatting is displayed and printed with a document.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowHyphens { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowHyphens : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if optional hyphens are displayed. An optional hyphen indicates where to break a word when it falls at the end of a line.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowInkAnnotations { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowInkAnnotations : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets a Boolean that shows or hides handwritten ink annotations. True displays ink annotations. False hides ink annotations.

remarks.para: To work with ink annotations, you must be running Microsoft Word on a tablet computer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowInsertionsAndDeletions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowInsertionsAndDeletions : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True for Microsoft Word to display insertions and deletions that were made to a document with Track Changes enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowMainTextLayer { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowMainTextLayer : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if the text in the specified document is visible when the header and footer areas are displayed.

remarks.para: The ShowMainTextLayer property is equivalent to the Show/Hide Document Text button on the Header and Footer toolbar.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowMarkupAreaHighlight { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowMarkupAreaHighlight : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets a Boolean that represents whether the markup area that shows revision and comment balloons is shaded. Read/write.

remarks.para: This property corresponds to the Markup Area Highlight option in the Show Markup menu on the Review Ribbon.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowObjectAnchors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowObjectAnchors : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if object anchors are displayed next to items that can be positioned in print layout view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowOptionalBreaks { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowOptionalBreaks : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if Microsoft Word displays optional line breaks.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowOtherAuthors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowOtherAuthors : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether other authors' presence should be visible in the document.
Docs.value: true if other authors' presence should be visible in the document; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: Read/write Boolean. Use this property to toggle showing other authors' presence while co-authoring.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowParagraphs { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowParagraphs : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if paragraph marks are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowPicturePlaceHolders { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowPicturePlaceHolders : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if blank boxes are displayed as placeholders for pictures.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowRevisionsAndComments { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowRevisionsAndComments : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True for Microsoft Word to display revisions and comments that were made to a document with Track Changes enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowSpaces { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowSpaces : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if space characters are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowTabs { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowTabs : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if tab characters are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowTextBoundaries { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowTextBoundaries : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if dotted lines are displayed around page margins, text columns, objects, and frames in print layout view.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ShowXMLMarkup { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ShowXMLMarkup : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns An Integer that represents whether XML tags are viewed in a document.

remarks.para: True indicates that tags are visible. False indicates that tags are hidden. wdToggle allows you to switch between showing and hiding the XML markup.

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the active window pane.

remarks.para: can be one of the following WdSpecialPane constants:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TableGridlines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TableGridlines : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if table gridlines are displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public Property Type As WdViewType
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdViewType default { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdViewType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdViewType value); };
member this.Type : Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdViewType with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the view type.

remarks.para: can be one of these WdViewType constants:

The Type property returns wdMasterView for all documents where the current view is an outline or a master document. The current view will never return wdOutlineView unless explicitly set first in code.

To check whether the current document is an outline, use the Type property and the collection's property. If the Type property returns either wdOutlineView or wdMasterView and the Count property returns zero, the document is an outline.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool WrapToWindow { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.WrapToWindow : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if lines wrap at the right edge of the document window rather than at the right margin or the right column boundary.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Zoom As Zoom
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Zoom ^ Zoom { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Zoom ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns a object that represents the magnification for the specified view.
